title: conferred on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as 

the Property Services 

(Regulation) Act 2011 (Licensing) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 17 April 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited property service (regulation) act 2011 (licensing) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 17 april 2024

title: conferred on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011
heading: In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations – 

“Regulations of 2012” means the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 
(Licensing) Regulations 2012 (S.I. No. 180 of 2012).
text_norm: 2 regulation - regulation 2012 mean property service (regulation) act 2011 (licensing) regulation 2012 (s.i no 180 2012)

title: conferred on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011
heading: 3. Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2012 is amended by substituting for
text_raw:
3. Regulation 4 of the Regulations of 2012 is amended by substituting for 

the table the following: 

“TABLE 

(1) 
Class of Licence 

Property Services Employer 

Independent Contractor 

Principal Officer or Employee 

(2) 
Licence Fee 

€1,100 

€1,100 

€110 

” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 27th February, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Justice consents to the making of the foregoing Regulations. 

[63] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

22 February, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

GIVEN under the seal of the Property Services Regulatory 
Authority, 

26 February, 2024. 

MICHAEL QUINLAN, 

Chairperson, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

MAEVE HOGAN, 

Chief Executive, Property Services Regulatory Authority. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [63]

title: conferred on it by section 25 of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011 
(Licensing) Regulation 2012. They amend the licence fee payable in respect of 
applications for the different classes of licences. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [63] 5
